thread.title: JOC lashes Marto in epic Facebook post
thread.title_full: JOC lashes Marto in epic Facebook post

title: JOC lashes Marto in epic Facebook post
text:
James O’Connor lashes Greg Martin in epic Facebook post over Justin Bieber’ sledge Jamie Pandaram The Daily Telegraph James O’Connor lashes Greg Martin in epic Facebook post over Justin Bieber’ sledge Jamie Pandaram The Daily Telegraph Greg Martin lets loose on James O'Connor 0:55 
Rugby: James O'Connor looks set for a return to France after being released from the Queensland Reds for 'personal reasons' something former Wallaby Greg Martin isn't buying October 14th 2015 2 days ago /video/video.news.com.au/Sport/Rugby Union/News/ 
RUGBY star James O’Connor has launched a stunning attack on commentator Greg Martin after copping a barrage of criticism from the retired Wallaby. 
O’Connor penned a 1500-word statement and posted it to Facebook, saying Martin “has no interest in the truth; he has no interest in finding the real story. Greg’s interest is his own opinion and making his own headlines, with no consideration to whom he drags through the mud”. 
The war of words between the pair comes a day after O’Connor was released by Queensland Reds to continue his career overseas. 
READ O’CONNOR’S FULL POST BELOW! 
Martin, who has a high media profile through a radio show and regular commentary spots with FoxSports, has been highly critical of O’Connor throughout the years. Other Stories
